CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS($User.UIThemeDisplayed,'Theme4'),IF(OR(breadwinner_ns__Invoice_Status__c='Paid In Full',breadwinner_ns__Status__c='Deposited'),IMAGE('/resource/breadwinner_ns__Breadwinner_for_NetSuite/Breadwinner/Images/Flags/green-flag.png','Paid/Deposited'), IF(OR(breadwinner_ns__Invoice_Status__c='Pending Approval',breadwinner_ns__Status__c='Unapproved Payment'),IMAGE('/resource/breadwinner_ns__Breadwinner_for_NetSuite/Breadwinner/Images/pencil.png', 'Pending Approval'),IF(OR(breadwinner_ns__Invoice_Status__c='Rejected',breadwinner_ns__Invoice_Status__c='Deleted'), IMAGE('/resource/breadwinner_ns__Breadwinner_for_NetSuite/Breadwinner/Images/x-ltng.png','Rejected/Deleted'),IF(CONTAINS(breadwinner_ns__Invoice_Status__c, 'Overdue'),IMAGE('/resource/breadwinner_ns__Breadwinner_for_NetSuite/Breadwinner/Images/Flags/red-flag.png', 'Overdue'),IMAGE('/resource/breadwinner_ns__Breadwinner_for_NetSuite/Breadwinner/Images/Flags/yellow-flag.png', 'Due/Not Deposited'))))), IF(OR(breadwinner_ns__Invoice_Status__c='Paid In Full',breadwinner_ns__Status__c='Deposited'), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Paid/Deposited",16,16), IF(OR(breadwinner_ns__Invoice_Status__c='Pending Approval',breadwinner_ns__Status__c='Unapproved Payment'),IMAGE('/resource/breadwinner_ns__Breadwinner_for_NetSuite/Breadwinner/Images/pencil.png','Pending Approval',16,16), IF(OR(breadwinner_ns__Invoice_Status__c='Rejected',breadwinner_ns__Invoice_Status__c='Deleted'), IMAGE('/resource/breadwinner_ns__Breadwinner_for_NetSuite/Breadwinner/Images/x-cls.png','Rejected/Deleted',16,16), IF(CONTAINS(breadwinner_ns__Invoice_Status__c, 'Overdue'),IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Overdue",16,16),IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif","Due/Not Deposited",16,16))))))
CustomField.label: Flag
